solution_line_template: After the first {first_distance} miles, he rowed {additional_distance_1} miles more, reaching {first_distance}+{additional_distance_1} = <<{first_distance}+{additional_distance_1}={distance_after_first_segment}>>{distance_after_first_segment} miles.

After resting, he adds {additional_distance_2} miles more, which is {additional_distance_2}+{distance_after_first_segment} = <<{additional_distance_2}+{distance_after_first_segment}={total_distance}>>{total_distance} miles
